Econ 101b Spring 2018 Topics and Assignments

Before Class Begins

Read: Robert Skidelsky: Keynes: A Very Short Introduction http://amzn.to/2fTAMiJ. Start with the first paragraph of chapter 1, then skip forward to chapters 3-5, then read the Epilogue. After that, go back to read the Introduction, chapters 1 and 2, and then chapter 6. Take the Quiz: Skidelsky Keynes Background 101b

Read: DeLong and Olney 3rd ed., chs 1-2.
